::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, jsonlite,
               tidygraph, ggraph,
               SmartEDA)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
MC3 <- fromJSON("MC3/data/MC3_graph.json")
MC3_schema <- fromJSON("MC3/data/MC3_schema.json")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(MC3)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
ExpCatViz(data=mc3_edges,
          col="lightblue")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[[1]]
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Take-home_Ex02MC3_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mc3_nodes_cleaned <- mc3_nodes %>%
  mutate(id = as.character(id)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(id)) %>%
  distinct(id, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  select(-thing_collected)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mc3_edges_cleaned <- mc3_edges %>%
  rename(from_id = source, 
         to_id = target) %>%
  mutate(across(c(from_id, to_id), 
                as.character)) %>%
  filter(from_id %in% mc3_nodes_cleaned$id, 
         to_id %in% mc3_nodes_cleaned$id) %>%
  filter(!is.na(from_id), !is.na(to_id))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
node_index_lookup <- mc3_nodes_cleaned %>%
  mutate(.row_id = row_number()) %>%
  select(id, .row_id)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mc3_edges_indexed <- mc3_edges_cleaned %>%
  left_join(node_index_lookup, 
            by = c("from_id" = "id")) %>%
  rename(from = .row_id) %>%
  left_join(node_index_lookup, 
            by = c("to_id" = "id")) %>%
  rename(to = .row_id) %>%
  select(from, to, is_inferred, type) %>%
  filter(!is.na(from) & !is.na(to)) 
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
used_node_indices <- sort(
  unique(c(mc3_edges_indexed$from, 
           mc3_edges_indexed$to)))

mc3_nodes_final <- mc3_nodes_cleaned %>%
  slice(used_node_indices) %>%
  mutate(new_index = row_number())
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
old_to_new_index <- tibble(
  old_index = used_node_indices,
  new_index = seq_along(
    used_node_indices))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mc3_edges_final <- mc3_edges_indexed %>%
  left_join(old_to_new_index, 
            by = c("from" = "old_index")) %>%
  rename(from_new = new_index) %>%
  left_join(old_to_new_index, 
            by = c("to" = "old_index")) %>%
  rename(to_new = new_index) %>%
  select(from = from_new, to = to_new, 
         is_inferred, type)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mc3_graph <- tbl_graph(
  nodes = mc3_nodes_final,
  edges = mc3_edges_final,
  directed = TRUE
)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
str(mc3_graph)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggraph(mc3_graph, 
       layout = "fr") +
  geom_edge_link(alpha = 0.3, 
                 colour = "gray") +
  geom_node_point(aes(color = `type`), 
                  size = 4) +
  geom_node_text(aes(label = type), 
                 repel = TRUE, 
                 size = 2.5) +
  theme_void()
```
